 2012-01982012-03-01,  ,  CH,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MARIE-CLAIRE BÉLANGER of Montréal, Quebec, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Museum of Science and Technology to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Jean Saint-Cyr.
